title: Rejouice Clone
description: This is a UI clone project of the original website of rejouice created using vanilla HTML, CSS & JS. This website imitates animations,styles and fonts used in original website.

title: Crystal Ball
description: A no-code AutoML dashboard that provides EDA over diverse datasets, and also trains customisable ML models based on those datasets, developed by using python streamlit.

title: Fake-Chat
description: A CLI based tool for training and deploying custom Chatbot models on GPT-2 algorithm using a custom dataset of conversations by using DialoGPT algorithms.
